do not burn me ..Not today  ...

attachments.displayName:
I sacrifice my self for you: I  totally ..came back branch crusty ..
do not burn me ..Not today  .Heat .. sand storm .. & summer ..
You can sit in my shadow .. when The winter comes: it will extend
Do not yank me today .. Let me in my scabbard ..
Sword of anger is passing  ,let speech die ..
& time of anger is going..do not return it by voice ..
How much i am joyful  that you're with me :

object.content:
1--I sacrifice my self for you: I  totally ..came back branch crusty ..
do not burn me ..Not today  .Heat .. sand storm .. & summer ..
You can sit in my shadow .. when The winter comes: it will extend
Do not yank me today .. Let me in my scabbard ..
Sword of anger is passing  ,let the speech die ..
& time of anger is going..do not return it by voice ..
How much i am joyful  that you're with me :

 2--- Tell me,.. many days i did not see you ..These days i had no eyes  ..
Burned my eyelids by candles of  my sense
The tears on my face & my breath ..
& my shadow on your shoulder .. my head on my chest ..
i sacrifice my self for you " don't listen to my thunder
Don't be disturbed by my lighting ..I if complain   i dream ..
No time for us to regret .. no age for us to  fear ..
You keep me as mouth .. don't keep me as letters  ..
If i sank in sea ​​.. No ,do not love after me .

Sword  of anger  is passing & going
let it go do return it by voice

title: Google+ List of Comments for an Activity
